Working with HKLÔÉÅ

TRANSLOCATION provides modification of intensities of XDS_ASCII.HKL file from the XDS.

Example:

python3 -m translocation -o new_file.HKL --HKL XDS_ASCII.HKL --k1 0.09 --fc1 0.4 0.3 0.0 --k2 0.13 --fc2 ...

The new_file.HKL contains corrected intensities that can be further processed with standard tools like AIMLESS or any other software. Please, archive the *XDS_ASCII.HKL* file!
